head-description: Altzone offers players the opportunity to join a community, play games, and explore new comics.
head-keywords: altzone, game, community, comics, galleries, play, register, log in
og-description: AltZone offers players the opportunity to join a community, play games, and explore new comics.
greenHairedDescription:
Hannu Hodari's fights emotions by focusing on eating. He is constantly on guard, never letting go of his shield, 
but lives in a constant state of flux.
hannuHodariDescription:
Hannu Hodari's fights emotions by focusing on eating. He is constantly on guard, never letting go of his shield, 
but lives in a constant state of flux.
purpleGirlsDescription:
In Girl team, the two become one, an invincible team. As emotions approach, they blow up a large bubblegum bubble to protect themselves and
 slowing down the course of events with a suction that is hard to release.
einsteinDescription:
Albert Älypää protects himself from emotions with a non-fiction book that creates diagrams of the emotional trajectory on the playing field. 
But Albert's constant graphs can sometimes annoy his teammates.
graffitiGayaDescription:
Graffiti Gaya skilfully projects emotions outside herself - onto other characters as well as into art. 
Gaya protects herself by spraying a cloud of spray paint that directs emotions to a teammate. Gaya bears no responsibility.
pirateDescription:
Pullo-Piraatti fights emotions by concentrating on drinking. He is constantly on guard, never letting go of his shield, 
but is in a constant state of flux.
